flavor_text_entries.diamond:
All of its fur dazzles if danger is
sensed. It flees while the foe is
momentarily blinded.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
Its forelegs have a muscle-based
system of generating electricity.
Its body shines if endangered.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The extension and contraction of
its muscles generates electricity.
It glows when in trouble.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
The extension and contraction of
its muscles generates electricity.
Its fur glows when it’s in trouble.

flavor_text_entries.sword:
This Pokémon generates electricity by contracting
its muscles. Excited trembling is a sign that Shinx
is generating a tremendous amount of electricity.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Electricity makes this Pokémon’s fur glow. Shinx
sends signals to others of its kind by shaking the
tip of its tail while the tail tip is shining brightly.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
Shakes its body to generate electricity. Its stature belies its
aggression—one must be patient to tame this Pokémon.
